summary: A playful 'nobody' at a famous investment bank becomes a successful trader overnight. As he's gradually becoming estranged from himself, he still seems unable to lose.
cast: Oscar Van Rompay|Halina Reijn|Leon Voorberg|Hans Kesting|Phi Nguyen|Pepijn Schoneveld|Tamer Avkapan|Doris Baaten|Wim Bouwens|Deborah Broere|Pepijn Cladder|Gijs de Lange|David Eeles|Turan Furat|Jaap ten Holt|Michael Ishak|Frank Jacquot|Christiaan Jelsma|Jessy Love|Jack Luceno|Duncan Mitchel|Bright O'Richards|Vincent van Ommen|Anne Prakke|Frank Rigter|Bob Schrijber|John Serkei|Dani Stauder|Bob Stoop|Frank Stoter|Jurgen Theunissen|Marilou van Andel|Marine Vermast|Nisette Verwaal|Boudewijn Willekes|Renato Zamboni|Rayen Ramesar|Frank Sheppard
title: Win/Win
